author: Emmycoops
title: Great for gluten free
text:
I stayed here for a week in February for work and was a little nervous about what food I was going to eat whilst I was there but the staff looked after me really well.
I had emailed the hotel before hand and they were prepared with gluten free bread and where very helpful. I ate most nights in the Grill restaurant which had gluten free markings on the menu. I was also provided with gluten free bread with oil, vinegar and pesto whilst waiting for my meal which was really nice. I even got room service one night which was very nice, although I did go to speak to the restaurant manager to make sure it was ok.
Overall I couldn't have asked more from the staff who were incredibly helpful.
The rooms were large and bed comfy with a good tv selection. The room could do with a bit of updating, I think it used to be a smoking room as the shower curtain smelt of smoke, but it was still a nice room.
The concierge was also very helpful with getting taxis to work everyday.
I would definitely stay again.
